verses.verse: <S%G1510>Am<s%> I not an <S%G652>apostle?<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I not <S%G1658>free?<s%> have I not <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord?<s%> are not you my <S%G2041>work<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> I be not an <S%G652>apostle<s%> to <S%G243>others,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G1065>doubtless<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> to you: for the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%> are you in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G1699>My<s%> <S%G627>answer<s%> to them that do <S%G350>examine<s%> me is <S%G3778>this,<s%>
<S%G2192>Have<s%> we not <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> and to <S%G4095>drink?<s%>

<S%G2192>Have<s%> we not <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G4013>lead<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> a <S%G79>sister,<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> as <S%G2532>well<s%> as <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and as the <S%G80>brothers<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G2786>Cephas?<s%>
<S%G2228>Or<s%> I <S%G3441>only<s%> and <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> not we <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G3361>forbear<s%> <S%G2038>working?<s%>

<S%G5100>Who<s%> goes a <S%G4754>warfare<s%> <S%G4218>any<s%> <S%G4218>time<s%> <S%G4218>at<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3800>charges?<s%> <S%G5100>who<s%> <S%G5452>plants<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and <S%G2068>eats<s%> not of the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G846>thereof?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5100>who<s%> <S%G4165>feeds<s%> a <S%G4167>flock,<s%> and <S%G2068>eats<s%> not of the <S%G1051>milk<s%> of the <S%G4167>flock?<s%>
<S%G2980>Say<s%> I <S%G5023>these<s%> things as a <S%G444>man?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> not the <S%G3551>law<s%> the <S%G5023>same<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> You shall not <S%G5392>muzzle<s%> the mouth of the <S%G1016>ox<s%> that <S%G248>treads<s%> out the corn. Does <S%G2316>God<s%> take <S%G3199>care<s%> for <S%G1016>oxen?<s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he it <S%G3843>altogether<s%> for our sakes? For our sakes, <S%G1063>no<s%> <S%G1063>doubt,<s%> this is <S%G1125>written:<s%> that he that <S%G722>plows<s%> <S%G3784>should<s%> <S%G722>plow<s%> in <S%G1680>hope;<s%> and that he that <S%G248>threshes<s%> in <S%G1680>hope<s%> should be <S%G3348>partaker<s%> of his <S%G1680>hope.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4687>sown<s%> to you <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> things, is it a <S%G3173>great<s%> thing <S%G1487>if<s%> we shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%> things?

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> be <S%G3348>partakers<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> over you, are not we <S%G3123>rather?<s%> <S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G5530>used<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>power;<s%> but <S%G4722>suffer<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> we should <S%G5100>hinder<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Do you not <S%G1492>know<s%> that they which <S%G2038>minister<s%> about <S%G2413>holy<s%> things <S%G2068>live<s%> of the things of the <S%G2411>temple?<s%> and they which <S%G4332>wait<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar<s%> are <S%G4829>partakers<s%> with the <S%G2379>altar?<s%>
<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> has the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1299>ordained<s%> that they which <S%G2605>preach<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> should <S%G2198>live<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

But I have <S%G5530>used<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things: neither have I <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, that it should be <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> to me: for it were <S%G2570>better<s%> <S%G3123><s%> for me to <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> that <S%G5100>any<s%> man should <S%G2758>make<s%> my <S%G2745>glorying<s%> <S%G2758>void.<s%>

For <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> I <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> to <S%G2745>glory<s%> of: for <S%G318>necessity<s%> is <S%G1945>laid<s%> on me; <S%G1161>yes,<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> is to me, <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2097>preach<s%> not the <S%G2097>gospel!<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thing <S%G1635>willingly,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3408>reward:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G210>against<s%> my <S%G210>will,<s%> a <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of the gospel is <S%G4100>committed<s%> to me.

<S%G5101>What<s%> is my <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> Truly that, when I <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> I may <S%G5087>make<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G77>without<s%> <S%G77>charge,<s%> that I <S%G2710>abuse<s%> not my <S%G1849>power<s%> in the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

For though I be <S%G1658>free<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> men, yet <S%G2192>have<s%> I <S%G1402>made<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G1402>servant<s%> to <S%G3956>all,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G4119>more.<s%>

And to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> as a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> to them that are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> as <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> them that are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law;<s%>

To them that are <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law,<s%> as <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law,<s%> <S%G5607>(being<s%> not <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> but <S%G1772>under<s%> the <S%G1772>law<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>) that I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> them that are <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law.<s%>

To the <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> I as <S%G770>weak,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G770>weak:<s%> I am <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G3956>all<s%> men, that I might by <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3843>means<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5100>some.<s%>
And <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> for the <S%G2098>gospel's<s%> sake, that I might be <S%G4791>partaker<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> with you.

<S%G1492>Know<s%> you not that they which <S%G5143>run<s%> in a <S%G4712>race<s%> <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> the <S%G1017>prize?<s%> <S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G5143>run,<s%> that you may <S%G2638>obtain.<s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> man that <S%G75>strives<s%> for the mastery is <S%G1467>temperate<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things. <S%G3303>Now<s%> they do it to <S%G2983>obtain<s%> a <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4735>crown;<s%> but we an <S%G862>incorruptible.<s%>
I <S%G5106>therefore<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5143>run,<s%> not as <S%G84>uncertainly;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4438>fight<s%> I, not as one that <S%G1194>beats<s%> the <S%G109>air:<s%>

But I <S%G5299>keep<s%> <S%G5299>under<s%> my <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G1396>bring<s%> it into <S%G1396>subjection:<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> that by <S%G3381>any<s%> <S%G4458>means,<s%> when I have <S%G2784>preached<s%> to <S%G243>others,<s%> I myself should be a <S%G96>castaway.<s%>
